p.egXML: Elizabeth went to Essex. She had always liked Essex.It is not clear here whether Essex refers to the place or to the nobleman. -MSM
Elizabeth went to Essex. She had always liked Essex.It is not clear here whether Essex refers to the place or to the nobleman. If the latter, it should be tagged as a personal name. -Michael
